lines.p:
“If Jehovah had not been with us”
—Let Israel now say—
“If Jehovah had not been with usWhen men rose up to attack us,
Then they would have swallowed us up aliveWhen their anger was burning against us.
Then the waters would have washed us away,The torrent would have swept over us.
The raging waters would have overwhelmed us.
May Jehovah be praised,For he has not given us as prey to their teeth.
We are like a bird that escapedFrom the hunter’s trap;The trap was broken,And we escaped.
Our help is in the name of Jehovah,The Maker of heaven and earth.”
